verbs.description: [ARG1: soft sugar cookie] [V: puffs] [ARG1: my husband aunt laurel] always made these cake - like cookies with her own farm - fresh eggs cream and butter now i prepare batches for christmas each year we like them [ARGM-CAU: because] they 're not overly sweet —d elaine rutschke spruce view alberta
